## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcasmparserextension">MCAsmParserExtension</a></>}>
Generic interface for extending the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcasmparser">MCAsmParser</a>, which is implemented by target and object file assembly parser implementations. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcasmparserextension/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>
